refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This method is used to obtain information about the capabilities of the server, such as files size limitations, supported types, etc...

refsect2.title: email
refsect2.para: For user identification, this should be a valid email account.

refsect2.title: password
refsect2.para: The MD5 hash of the password.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: This method returns a structure as follows:
refsect1.programlisting: 'flError' boolean 0 success, 1 fault 'message' string fault message (can be used to handle error cases) ctBytesInUse integer how many bytes are used on repository legalFileExtensions string array which extensions are recognized maxBytesPerUser integer total bytes available for this user maxFileSize integer largest file size for upload (bytes) yourUpstreamFolderUrl string base URL for user's blog on repository

example.para: Simple example of fetching the server capabilities.
